text: Kapena monga mdima wa mâ€™nyanja yozama kwambiri yokutidwa ndi mafunde aakulu oyenda pamwamba pa mafunde anzake ndi mitambo pamwamba pake ndiponso mdima wosanjana ndi mdima unzake. Ndipo ngati iye atambasula dzanja lake sangathe kuliona. Ndithudi munthu amene saunikidwa ndi Mulungu sangathe kuona kuwala kwa mtundu wina uliwonse
